channel.title: How would i go by NOT making an area wildy?
channel.description:
i walked in mage bank on my server and it said LEVEL 150 so i went into the pool. then it was lvl 147.
how can i stop these areas being wildy and making them say SAFE? (all other areas say safe normaly)
thanks in advance

item.title: How would i go by NOT making an area wildy?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

search for this:

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

then

edit the coords of something like this…

		if (coordY >= 3884 && coordY <= 3899 && coordX <= 2534 && coordX >= 2548) {
			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if (coordY >= 3884 && coordY <= 3899 && coordX <= 2534 && coordX >= 2548) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;

note that is in my server… it may not be exactly the same i yours.

also so people use the inside of the mage bank for pking.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i go by NOT making an area wildy?
